description:
Uranus and Neptune have turned against the Sailor Guardians by swearing allegiance to Galaxia. Despite Sailor Moon’s desperate plea, the two continue their attack, forcing her and the Star Lights to retreat.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Dying Stars: Uranus and Neptune`s Last Stand
Las estrellas que despaarecen. La última actuación de Urano y Neptuno.
消えゆく星々! ウラヌス達の最期
